Text: The yell came from over there!
Help me!
Hold on, I'm just a kid. \n How am I supposed to \n help you!?
You must be used to \n Scarabs living down \n here.

I can't handle them, 
 they're so disgusting. 
 Hold them off while I 
 run!
What the-!? \n How could he put that \n poor boy in danger!?
Look at all those Nevi!
Those people are pinned down!
Defeat the Nevi
I have to help them!
Find Whoever \n Yelled for Help
Thank you, if it weren't \n for-
I like the cut of your \n jib. Would you like a \n job?
Take me to safety - I'll \n pay you handsomely.

Please, miss, my 
 sister... She's out 
 there all alone with the 
 Scarabs.
Stay out of this, kid! \n This is between us \n adults.
Some adult you are!
Dad told me never to \n speak back to people \n from Havina...
Don't worry about him, \n or your sister - I'm \n sure she'll be okay.
O-Okay.
Where did you say your \n sister was?
The big island in the \n middle. At least, I \n think so.
She's probably hiding \n somewhere.
Ugh, I never should've \n gone down to the slums.
We're done, you \n can go now.
Oh right, \n your money.
I don't want \n your money!
I need to get back to \n find that boy's sister!
*Sniff* *Sniff* \n I'm so scared...
You don't have to be \n anymore. I'm here to \n help.
Your brother asked me to \n come find you, I'm sorry \n it took so long.
Let's fly away from \n those horrible Scarabs!
Hey!!!
I'm so glad you're safe! \n Thank you for saving my \n little sister.
It's dangerous here, you \n should go hide.
I'll take care of the \n other Scarabs.
Be careful!

I will. 
 Now it's time to work 
 off some of the stress 
 that guy unloaded on me.
Kids come first!
You can't leave me here!
It's me!
I'm so glad you're safe! \n Thank you!
Just happy you're \n both alright.
Fine job, leaving me to \n those things! Don't you \n know who I am?

You're all parasites. 
 Without me and the 
 others in Havina, you'd 
 have nothing.
I'll make sure you pay \n for this!
What's with that guy!?
Just ignore him, okay?
Now go hide \n someplace safe.
I'm gonna take out the \n rest of the Scarabs.
Okay, be careful!
It's time to take \n out a little anger.
Thanks for getting rid \n of the Scarabs!
Do the people in Havina \n always treat you like \n that guy?
Well, I haven't met \n many...
But Dad always said \n never to disobey the \n people in Havina.
They control the \n government and the \n Garrison.
This place is so messed \n up... But is there any \n way to change it?
Hey sis, don't forget \n to say thank you.
Thank you lady! \n You're so cool.

You're welcome! If you 
 need anything else, just 
 let me know and I'll 
 come flying.

Let's get out of here!
Rich Man: \n Please, you've got to get me out of this place!
Rich Man: \n Can't we go any faster!?
Rich Man: \n You've got to hurry and get me somewhere safe.

Find and Save the Little Girl
I have to find his sister.
Find and Save the Little Girl

Come on, I've gotta get you to safety.
Your brother's worried about you.
Let's get you somewhere safe.
Escort the Girl to \n Her Brother
Little Girl: \n Wow! We're flying!
Rich Man: \n You'll regret this! Count on it!
Rich Man: \n Hey, where are you going! Get me outta here!
Rich Man: \n Phew, so glad to be out of that awful place.
Rich Man: \n Missing girls, Scarabs everywhere, uck, what a mess!
Look at all those Scarabs... I've gotta find that girl.
He said she should be on the middle island.
She should be around there.
I've gotta get that girl to her brother!
The old guy needs my help first.
The kid said his sister was somewhere with the Scarabs.
I hear someone!

Now that's better!

Take that!
How do you like this!?
There's more where that came from!
Ugh, that guy was getting on my nerves.
Unbelievable.
That took care of them.
I've got to see who needs help.
I've gotta save those people.
I've got to get back to look for that little girl.
I've got to find that little girl!
I've got to take that little girl to her brother.
I've got to escort them somewhere safe.
I've gotta take out those Scarabs!
There's no time for this...
I've got to save them!
There's no time for this...
I've got to get them somewhere safe.
